Types

VirtualBoxClient = ref object of RootObj
VM = object of RootObj
  name*: string
  guid*: string
Type representing VM VM is typically referenced by name or guid 
Disk = object of RootObj
  path*: string
Type representing Disks Referenced by path

    raises: [OSError, Exception], tags: [ExecIOEffect, ReadIOEffect, RootEffect].}
Execute vboxmange command die raises exception if true otherwise fails silently

    raises: [OSError, Exception],
    tags: [ReadDirEffect, ExecIOEffect, ReadIOEffect, RootEffect].}
